parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: (Size of the array returned by IBody2::AddPropertyExtension2 ) - (Position of the property extension in the array)

title: IBody2.GetPropertyExtension2
description: Gets the specified property extension on this body.

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: (Size of the array returned by IBody2::AddPropertyExtension2 ) - (Position of the property extension in the array)

remarks:
IBody2::AddPropertyExtension2 adds property extensions to a last-in-first-out, 1-based array and returns the size of that array.
NOTE
: SOLIDWORKS recommends that you use the
IAttribute
,
IAttributeDef
, and
IParameter
interfaces instead of this method. These three interfaces provide more flexibility.
